languages.text: "На этом поле битвы нет крови, нет следов. Советую не поддаваться... кхм... истерии, охватившей нашего почтенного спутника. И молиться Императору".
"There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "На этом поле битвы нет крови, нет следов. Советую не поддаваться... кхм... истерии, охватившей нашего почтенного спутника. И молиться Императору".

traits.locale_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
"There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
"There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
"There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
"There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

languages.text: "Auf diesem Schlachtfeld gibt es kein Blut, keine noch so kleine Spur. Ich rate Euch, nicht der ... äh ... Hysterie anheim zu fallen, die unsere geschätzte Begleitung befallen hat. Und zum Imperator zu beten."
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Auf diesem Schlachtfeld gibt es kein Blut, keine noch so kleine Spur. Ich rate Euch, nicht der ... äh ... Hysterie anheim zu fallen, die unsere geschätzte Begleitung befallen hat. Und zum Imperator zu beten."

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas la moindre trace de sang sur ce champ de bataille. Je vous invite à ne pas sombrer dans... l'hystérie qui s'est emparée de notre estimé compagnon. Et à prier l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas la moindre trace de sang sur ce champ de bataille. Je vous invite à ne pas sombrer dans... l'hystérie qui s'est emparée de notre estimé compagnon. Et à prier l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «No hay sangre en este campo de batalla. Ni rastro de ella. Le aconsejo que no sucumba a la... ejem... histeria que se ha apoderado de nuestro compañero. Y que rece al Emperador».
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «No hay sangre en este campo de batalla. Ni rastro de ella. Le aconsejo que no sucumba a la... ejem... histeria que se ha apoderado de nuestro compañero. Y que rece al Emperador».

languages.text: 「この戦場に血は落ちていない。一滴も。我々の尊敬する仲間を襲った。あぁ…ヒステリーに屈しないよう忠告する。そして皇帝に祈りなさい」
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「この戦場に血は落ちていない。一滴も。我々の尊敬する仲間を襲った。あぁ…ヒステリーに屈しないよう忠告する。そして皇帝に祈りなさい」

languages.text: “战场上没有鲜血，连一丝血迹都没有。我建议你不要受制于……呃……我们尊敬的同伴身上的妄想症，建议你向帝皇祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “战场上没有鲜血，连一丝血迹都没有。我建议你不要受制于……呃……我们尊敬的同伴身上的妄想症，建议你向帝皇祈祷。”

languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."

languages.text: "Bu savaş alanında kan dökülmemiş. Tek bir iz bile yok. Sana muhterem yoldaşımızı avcunun içine... Alan... Histeriye yenik düşmemeni ve İmparator'a dua etmeni tavsiye ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "There is no blood on this battlefield, not a trace. I advise you not to succumb to the... ah... hysteria that has gripped our esteemed companion. And pray to the Emperor."
